item.title: How to fit sigmoid to time series data
item.author: alvaroaguado3@gmail.com (Alvaro Aguado)
item.description: Question: How can I fit a sigmoid function to time series data in R? Solution: To fit a non linear regression with a sigmoid function to time series data you can use the nls function with a self-start function. In this case SSlogis require(tidyverse) ## Loading required package: tidyverse ## -- Attaching packages -------------------------- tidyverse 1.2.1 -- ## v ggplot2 3.2.1 v purrr 0.3.3 ## v tibble 2.1.3 v dplyr 0.
